lexUnit.name: conspire.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make secret plans jointly to commit an unlawful or harmful act

sentence.text: They are also accused of conspiring to pervert the course of justice .
They are jointly accused of conspiring with others to cause an explosion likely to endanger life .
A college football association is charged with conspiring to limit the number of college games that football fans can see on television .
However , Hatton still faces two charges of conspiring to defraud the local authority .
Two others have since pleaded guilty to conspiring to supply the drug .
This restriction , however , merely limits Mr Nesbitt , who is chairman of the casino company Crockford 's , and Mr Isaacs from conspiring together to start a rival record chain .
Davie Cooper and Bobby Russell conspired against their old club , Cooper creating the opening for Russell to score after six minutes .
The hon. Gentleman goes on about conspiracies against the working class , but I gather that in his constituency the working class conspired against him .
The world really is conspiring against you .
It is no less accurate than Lord Taylor 's evocation of the ` penologists , criminologists and bureaucrats " who evidently conspire to hand villains the poor box .
` I want you to examine this act in which you propose we should conspire with the enemy against our emperor .
In the 80s , the banks , with poor management , had conspired with government to get us into this situation .

Consequently , during the last months of his life Edward conspired with Northumberland to exclude his half-sister from the throne and to elevate instead the duke 's Protestant daughter-in-law , Lady Jane Grey .
Mr Bunn allegedly conspired with others between 1 November 1990 and 31 December 1991 to defraud a syndicate of 35 banks led by Swiss Bank Corporation and Credit Lyonnais .
Jatoi was accused of conspiring with the Pakistan People 's Party ( PPP ) to install his son Masroor Jatoi as Sind 's Chief Minister .
In February 1988 he had been indicted by a Miami grand jury for having conspired between 1981 and 1986 with the Medelln drugs cartel of Colombia to traffick drugs into the USA .

In August Gring told Lipski that certain anti-German incidents along the Polish border were poisoning the atmosphere and that Poles were conspiring to interfere with the work of the League in Danzig .
Can you imagine poor old Tony and me conspiring to deflect the course of justice ?
